question: PRASAD and HRIDAY schemes are associated to:
explanation: The National Heritage Development and Augmentation Yojana (HRIDAY) was launched by the Minister of Urban Development. It seeks to preserve and rejuvenate the rich cultural heritage of the country.  The Scheme is being implemented in 12 identified Cities viz. Ajmer, Amaravati, Amritsar, Badami, Dwarka, Gaya, Kancheepuram, Mathura, Patna, Puri, Varanasi and Velankanni. On the other hand, 13 cities-Ajmer, Amritsar, Amravati, Dwarka, Gaya, Kamakhaya, Kancheepuram, Kedarnath, Mathura, Patna, Puri, Varanasi and Velankanni have been identified for development under Pilgrimage Rejuvenation and Spirituality Augmentation Drive (PRASAD) by the Tourism Ministry.
